      • isActivityVisible

        public static boolean isActivityVisible(android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity activity)
        This is a compat method used to see if an activity is visible (not in the background). While checking the declared field works well, it is advised to implement VisibleActivity here so that the implementation is clear. See TGBaseActivity for an example
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity to check
        Returns:
        if the activity is visible
